edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.obo

Class OBOGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.obo.OBOGraph

  • public class OBOGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    A directed object graph that reads in, structures, and connects the terms in an OBO file. Builds the graph from OBONode's and OBOEdge's. Currently compliant with the standard at: OBO Documentation found at http://www.geneontology.org/GO.format.obo-1_2.shtml
    Version:
    0.2.1
    Author:
    Collin McCormack (cmccorma)
    See Also:
    OBONode, OBOEdge

      • getNodeById

        public OBONode getNodeById(java.lang.String id)
        Find an OBONode by it's ontology-specific ID.
        Parameters:
        id - String including ontology prefix e.g. 'GO:0005400'
        Returns:
        OBONode if found, null otherwise

      • searchNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<OBONode> searchNames(java.lang.String query)
        Searches for exact name and synonym matches.
        Parameters:
        query - String of the name of the node/term (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        an array list of matching OBONode's, may be empty

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<OBONode> search(java.lang.String query)
        Searches the names, synonyms, and definitions using the supplied query.
        Parameters:
        query - search String
        Returns:
        ArrayList of OBONode's that were the best match to the query

      • top

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> top(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> list)
        Retrieves the top result from a list of index scores generated in search(...). There may be multiple tied results.
        Parameters:
        list - HashMap id score
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing best result(s)
